reviews.review_text: Very good food in a very nice location. Fancy food and according high prices. Food: Very good food all-around. Great meat and very tasty side dishes. (We loved the meat and mushroom risotto) Dishes are more on the fancy side. Service: Very friendly and professional service as one would expect from such a restaurant. Ambiance: Stunning location fancy but laid back. We enjoyed it. Price: It is quite expensive Dish recommendation: Anything meat. And the mushroom risotto. Conclusion: Very nice place with great food. Just mind the prices. Vegetarian options: There are vegetarian options. Dietary restrictions: They are happy to accommodate food restrictions.
I think we tried nearly everything on the happy hour menu, loved the carpaccio.  We would have liked to have a little faster drink service but, that s the only issue we had. Everything was great.

We had an impressive lunch at The Roof. The food was fantastic, and we thoroughly enjoyed it. We want to express our heartfelt thanks to Chef Ray and Justin for crafting such a memorable meal and the service.

Our first time in Vancouver BC and after a heavy days shopping we visited this restaurant, having passed it earlier in the day, for a quick drink. We initially sat outside at street level only to be directed to the roof terrace accessed by a lift - this was a fortunate move for us that was well received. Briefly; a stunning roof terrace with the kitchen open to the seating area. Not much of a view but the cool vibe, smooth fixtures and furniture and chilled sound track more than made up for this. Our drink quickly turned into a meal and several drinks. The food was excellent and not as pricey as the surroundings would lead you to believe. The waiting staff were as alert and attentive than any that I have encountered. A lush experience. I fully recommend a visit.

We went to Black & Blue on a whim - we had an old gift card we need to use from Glowbal, it was a sunny day in Vancouver, I had heard great things about The Roof - so why not go see? We were greeted by a lovely team of hosts who said they could add us to the wait list, and us, being oblivious (we did not realize the dinning room wasn t open yet), asked if we could sit at the bar and wait. They didn t even flinch, the bartender allowed us to sit and hangout while he prepped, within 45 mins they somehow had a table for us upstairs and boy am I glad they did! We very much so took advantage of the happy hour ordering margarita s (on the rocks and so yummy), sangria (could actually taste the wine which was a refreshing change), and then for food we ordered some fresh oysters (we re obsessed, sue us), the crispy calamari (marinated in buttermilk and spices to make it so tender and flavourful), the ahi tuna tartar (each bite was to be savoured as it was a melody in your mouth), the Quattro formaggio flatbread (not our favourite but still so tasty), and the prawn cocktail (could have passed on this, was good but tuna and calamari were just exceptional comparatively). All in all it was a fantastic visit, the service was amazing, and the atmosphere was a 10/10. If you re ever downtown looking for a happy hour spot, this is it.

Very nice setting and the tenderloin steak we got was so filling and so soft and was cooked to perfection. Definitely recommend. My girlfriend brought me here as part of a surprise for my birthday and they were kind enough to give me a treat. Thanks again! Will recommend to my peers

My husband and I celebrated our anniversary here this weekend. The service and atmosphere was amazing, and the food was pretty good! but nothing super inventive. The tenderloin was cooked perfectly, and the sauces complimented the cut. The antipasto plate was well-portioned for the price and had a nice variety of cheese, and the halibut was flakey with a chimichurri that had a good kick at the end. I ll definitely be back to try their happy hour

Lovely place for steak! We has the breaded cauliflower that was perfectly roasted to sweetness and tuna tartare as started.  The homemade potato chips was perfectly crisped.  The main entree was a 55 ounce Tomahawk steak, served medium rare, with fingerling roasted potatoes, sweet peppers and brussels sprouts.  Ask for extra side of chimmichura sauce.  Street parking for 2hrs or parking garage nearby.  If you are chilled they bring you a warm blanket.

Their food was very good. Their oyster mushrooms were amazing, we absolutely loved it. But the best part of this restaurant, we would say, is their ambiance. Their decors, vibe and music were great and we had lots of fun, while staying safe. Their service was great as well. Even though its a proper patio, it wasnt cold either, so we could actually dress up and didnt have to wear our jackets.

This place is amazing. Rachel was our server and she was very attentive and informative.  My girlfriend took me here for my birthday, and it was first visit and I would certainly come back.  We had the mussels to start which were by far the biggest I have ever had, and incredibly flavourful. I had the NY strip with Lobster Mashed potato s and my Girlfriend had the Eggplant Parm with some Brussel sprouts. My steak was cooked  medium  but seems a bit over for my taste. I believe it was cooked right, but my expectations on medium were a bit closer to their medium rare. They happily remade the steak for me with the second being a perfect cook. The manager Sumit was wonderful and very helpful during the whole service. We will most certainly be back

I have dined at several of the Glowbal Group restaurants over the years, and for a family members birthday, we decided to try The Roof @ Black+Blue. Its menu is sort of a hybrid of Black+Blue downstairs and nearby sister restaurant Coast. We dined early to take advantage of the latter part of Happy Hour.  The Happy Hour cocktails were very nice, the related appetizers were tasty, and both were a good value.  Our entrees were amazing, including the impressive tomahawk steak shared by the birthday celebrant and partner. And, we finally got to use several gift certificates I had purchased last year for a special occasion. Definitely worth trying like all the Glowbal Group restaurants.

Came here for the first time on an extra rainy/windy night and expected it to be chilly and somewhat wet but when sitting it felt like being indoors. The place is very well heated and completely covered from wind and rain to the point where you dont even need your jacket. We ordered the MacN Cheese Sticks and Tiger Prawns for starters and both were very good. The sauce in the prawns was amazing. For our main we ordered the Tenderloin Steak and Rib Eye Steak. Both were great but the Tenderloin was next level juicy. For desert we ordered some cake which was delicious because it wasnt overly sweet. Overall, the service was good and the waiter even took our mains back to the kitchen after she saw that we ended up sharing to be cut up for us.

Very nice large patio in the heart of downtown Vancouver. Came here for happy hour and was pleasantly surprised and nice it was. I would recommend making reservations first if you can since it can be very busy. I tried a variety of drinks and food items on the happy hour menu and all were good. Seating was for two hours which gives you plenty of time to order and try out different items. Worth going to on a nice sunny day

We made a reservation at the rooftop garden patio and its gorgeous up there.  Our waitress was friendly and attentive, the food was perfect, and the view was phenomenal.  Keep in mind that it is somewhat exposed to the elements so it could get quite warm if youre not seated in a more shade area.

Our experience today was wonderful, thanks in large part to our server Michel and the manager as well!  A special thanks to them both.   He was fast, attentive, funny and considerate.   The happy hour options are excellent with good portions and easily shared.  I recommend the brisket and the skewers. And going there! Dietary restrictions: They are very attentive to any dietary restrictions.

If I could give more stars I would.  This is probably the best dining experience we ve had in Vancouver.  The happy hour is the best out of any restaurants in this category in yvr.  We started with the charcuterie board and all had burgers that were so good!!  They made our daughter s birthday extra special with the yummy comp birthday treat.  The bill I thought was very reasonable for what we enjoyed. Special thanks to the lovely hostess Diana who made sure we didn t lose our table as we were running late and our lovey waitress Cara you both were so nice and made our day perfect!  Can t forget to mention how beautiful this restaurant is inside as well as the patio, well done B&B!
My girlfriend and I love this place!! We come here for happy hour and it has always been amazing! The staff are friendly - make sure you make a reservation before coming in just to guaranty a spot!

Great experience. Made a reservation at the rooftop to celebrate my birthday. Eventhough we arrived late, they managed to move us to a very nice seat after I requested. Our waitress was very friendly and often asked to fill our waters and drinks. He even hepled us take several photos. My friend told me she really enjoyed it and brought her family to eat here again the next day.
Mac & cheese sticks are to die for. Love the food here, a bit pricier for drinks but worth the view and good tunes. Sunday happy hour is always a good time. The hot dog was average.

The roof is it s own experience. It s frenetic. Not really a place for a relaxing dinner but great for an evening outside in the crowd. So it gets noisy. But the food was great and the service was very friendly. Nice place for a steak night out.

By far one of my favorite patios in Vancouver. The Roof is right in the heart of downtown, has an excellent menu and great service. We stopped by for lunch during work and had a great experience. Ive been here numerous times and intend to visit in the future.
Our server Rachel was incredible, the food, amazing. The atmosphere made me wish I could be in Van more frequently!
Great place for dinner. Beautiful decor and the ambience was perfect. Friendly customer service, delicious food and amazing drinks!!

We came here for lunch during a staycation. The atmosphere and service are top notch! Love how cozy and magical it feels. We ordered the blackened ahi tuna, jerk chicken and waygu beef fried rice - everything was SO GOOD. Thank you so much Jessica for the amazing service! I hope our visit was memorable

Amazing service and food as always! I brought my brother here to celebrate his birthday, it was his first time. I decided to treat him to a tomahawk steak and appetizers. We had  Ryan  as our server he was very kind and went out of his way to make our experience great. What I really appreciated the most was the fact he communicated with us that he was busy and drinks would take a while, which he took full responsibility. Amazing! He even found the time to constantly keep filling up our waters and brought my brother a birthday dessert at the end. My brother was really impressed with everything and this experience probably made his year he was so happy. Look forward to dining here again soon!

I had family visiting from out of town and went for dinner here for a special occasion and the staff here really went above and beyond, our server was amazing and the food was great, our favourite was the steaks, (we tried a few cuts and they were all tender and cooked perfectly), and the Mac and cheese, all the sides are for sharing so we got to try quite a few, and for dessert we had the butter cake, it was a great end to our meal. It was a cold and rainy night but next to the fire was nice a warm and the ambiance was unbeatable. I want to note also our server was a true professional, she really made the night for us, we will definitely be back soon!
Great food with amazing service. Ordered the oysters, clams, and wagyu hot stone. Emad, the owner, greeted us and was extremely friendly. Would definitely come back!

Went there for a birthday, it was the best service I ve ever had at a restaurant, our server was super friendly and helpful. The ambiance was amazing, everything about the roof was beautiful, and the food was incredible! I will definitely be back again!
A superb 4 course meal for a company function. The surf and turf main was amazing. The mashed potatoes were super creamy, gravy was rich and the steak was cooked to perfection.
1degC weather on roof top surprisingly warm and thanks for Chef Wilson we have the best Beef   Kid menu and the best Salmon Wellington  5 Stars   reviews by Bella
Enjoyed our time here. Beautiful place with a delicious menu. Recommend it to everyone!

Had such an amazing time here on a trip to Vancouver from Seattle! We stopped by for happy hour in the afternoon on a Saturday and we re seated right away. Every staff we encountered was welcoming and accommodating, but our server Sasha stole the show! Sasha was extremely attentive, kind and made our experience even more incredible. The vibe is impeccable, and the food is top notch (please try the Mac & Cheese sticks). If we lived in Vancouver, there is no doubt we would be regulars here, learning Sasha s schedule to be served by him every time!!

Wonderful experience! Great food, great atmosphere, great service! If you want a slightly more upscale vibe while not feeling stuffy this is a great option! Our server Ryan was a delight and if I ever am back in Vancouver i ll be enjoying this spot again, hopefully with the same server! Dietary restrictions: We had a Gluten free person and the accommodations were top tier!

My husband and I came here for our 1st anniversary last night. We had an amazing time! Our waiter, Ryan, really made the whole experience. He was so professional, friendly, and patient. He explained the menu to us is great detail, and he even brought out all the different steaks to choose from and explained them to us at our table. I ve really never had such exceptional service. The food was great, the crispy cauliflower was delicious and the steaks were some of the best I ve ever eaten. When we mentioned we wanted to share, Ryan even made sure our steaks were cut up on a nice platter for us to share. Just all around great experience and maybe this will be our anniversary spot!
The best bartenders in town. Super nice friendly people. I tried so many different cocktails. They are so enthusiastic of their job.
Sunday 3 course dinner salad to start prime rib main and desert pay 6 dollars extra for any desert you want comes with cheese cake I ordered butter cream cake was delicious highly recommended

We used to come to black and blue a lot and had a bad experience during the pandemic so didnt come back for a long time. We were pleasantly surprised that everything had improved when we came in on Valentines Day for my birthday! Decor, food, drinks! All much better than it used to be. We cant wait to come back. Great job with all the improvements!

It s my favourite place to visit I go there since 2014 and I love the place love the workers and Iam considering myself as loyal customer and Iam proud to know the owner emad he s actually from my Nigbour country Egypt    as a North African I love to support people who are successful and hard working god blessings to all of you black and blue staff
If you are looking for a more casual setting than an usual steakhouse, The Roof at Black &  Blue is must try. The waitress was really helpful with extensive knowledge of the wine and champagne menu.
I have been to many restaurants, I have never seen a server as professional and enthusiastic as Shelley is. We had wonderful time in the Roof. I will come again!

My boyfriend surprised me for my birthday and brought me here. He said dress fancy and Ill blindly lead you to dinner. He had me put Burrard street on the GPS and when we walked in, he turned to the ladies behind the desk and said the reservation at 8 for the roof please. They pointed to take the elevator and we walked in. I walked in confused and taking everything in. Then the hostess sat us down and introduced us to our waitress, Rachel. She was lovely and recommended some really amazing things! For our meat we had rib eye, Mac and cheese stick and more!! It was delicious! I was surprised at how well marinated the meat was!! Also lets not forget the drinks!!! If you live for alcohol, then Id highly recommend it!!! Its a good compliment to the meal!! Also had the butter cake and chocolate ecstasy for dessert!!! Im in love!!! Thank you Black and blue!! Also thank you to Rachel! We love this place!!!
Fantastic service. They take your allergic issue very very seriously!!

Best meal I have ever had. Fantastic service. Wonderful atmosphere. If you re in Vancouver and you want a fantastic experience and have some money to burn, go here. Would give more than 5 stars if i could.
Awesome! Definitely worth the visit

The service was exceptional!!! The atmosphere was amazing!! The food was top notch. Perfectly cooked and and full of flavours. Cant wait to come back in summer time for open roof patio!! Huge shut-out to Blake and the team for making our experience a memorable one. Will definitely come back!!
Fabulous steak house vibe with excellent service and great wine list Dont miss this if youre in Vancouver Food
Food delicious- very very good service - staffs and manager super friendly - nice - Beautiful roof top - very nice set up 5******

Amazing experience here!  My wife and I lucked out and had amazing bartenders, Upi & Goose, serve us at the bar.  All I can say is, WOW!  Seriously two of the best highly-skilled bartenders in all of Vancouver, BC.  On top of that, Upi & Goose were some of the most fun and personable people we ve ever met.  The food and drinks are unreal, would highly recommend!
Fantastic apperizers, steaks, lobster, and dessert!  Pricey but worth it!

Visited the roof with my aunt and the service and food was amazing! Sabrina served us and provided the most meticulous level of service and detail. As she said, if you re looking for a savoury, melt in your mouth, and a special treat, the kobe is the best . Will be coming back and asking for her and kobe!!! You should too. The mac and cheese sticks were also phenomenal. The atmosphere and service was the best and the view from the windows was perfect for a night out
This restaurant was by far the best I have ever been too! The steaks are to die for, Waygu specifically was amazing! The staff here are incredibly accommodating and generous! Will be back again!
Excellent service, delicious food
Beautiful space and good service. Love the mac and cheese sticks

The service and ambience were exceptional!  Thank you for making our night downtown perfect!  The Roof is beautifully decorated and everyone that works there is courteous, friendly and helped provide an amazing dining experience!  Will definitely be back!
What a great place to have food and a function. The food is amazing in the service is even better
We had an amazing time at The Roof last night. The place is absolutely stunning and it was really well heated. The food was delicious and our server Shelby was so lovely.

Marvin is the coolest best dude ive met and can make a mean anything you freaking ask him to make. Amanda is also the coolest gal youll ever meet and can make the best Dirty Martini you will ever have in your life. John is the only reason we got in he saved our buns We will be back
Kids friendly, the meals are fresh and delicious. Amazing service. Will go back for sure.

The entire ambiance of The Roof is to die for, however our experience was exceptional due to one individual who took our experience to heart. Jenka is a huge asset to Glowbal and their patrons. I experienced her service first hand and would return solely based on that alone.

Absolutely phenomenal atmosphere, beautiful dry age room, unbelievably good wine selection, delicious appetizers, bafflingly delicious steaks and amazing sides, pair that with an amazing server Upi dude is an absolute legend at being a server

Food was FANTASTIC!!! We ended up filling up on appies but thats because it was so good. The mask nazis almost made me walk out but in the end Im glad we stayed. Once seated it felt like we were in a nice restaurant in the Caribbean. Oh and, best nachos in the city
Beautiful dining experience and the food is enjoyable. Our server was so nice and gave the best insight on the menu, he literally made our night. Had a great time here!
Every-time I go to vancouver I know i have to stop here, great ambience and I know i m going to get great food every time very reliable.
Such a beautiful spot. We came here for happy hour and we re not disappointed! Food was delicious, cocktails tasted amazing. Definitely coming back for more!
Good choice for my birthday! Really tasty, friendly and nice mood.
Della the host last night for the patio was AMAZING!! She went above and beyond to make our experience great! Good place - the nachos are the best I ve ever had.
Very nice find! Youd think the rooftop terrace would enough to rave about but it comes a close second to the amazing service. Burrata Flatbread is a must imo. Loved it!!
Amazing food (steaks, side dishes, fish and salads) and great service. Highly recommend in Vancouver.
Gorgeous place for a fancy dine...pricey $$$. Best wagyu steak Ive had so far. Compliments to the chef
Ask and order your steak below. The rooftop has a different menu
Delicious food!! We didn t know what drinks to order so the bartender make us a surprise drink and it was delicious! Beautiful restaurant perfect for pics
Food and atmosphere here is amazing. Patio is beautifully decorated. Best steak I ve had
Obviously it s nice and I love the food, just wish they had more available reservations
Amazing food, don t miss happy hour and the beef nachos
Love this patio! Private, sunny and a great vibe....and theres the food. All excellent!
Had a fantastic time. The extra touch by staff was phenomenal
Amazing happy hours prices for such an upscale place. Really great food and friendly service.
Mac and cheese sticks!
Amazing service and food!!
COVID-19 friendly. Get in.
Awesome location and great patio. Food and service were excellent.
great place, for appies definitely try their Mac n cheese stix!!!!
Johnathon. Perfection. Cool dude. Great food. That smile tho.
It was good...
Gotta try the Tomahawk, its awesome!
Top 5 best food I ever had
Great service and food. Perfect ribeye.
Great spot for steaks and drinks
The best of Vancouver when it comes to great steak and atmosphere.
Very good
Had as fantastic lovely meal here with friends
Great spot
Beautiful setting hidden above the streets.
Great atmosphere under the open sky!
Great atmosphere to enjoy food and drink
The staff is amazing
Great weather and great staff.
Great food and service
Good stuff
#dineoutvancouver
